scripts.test:tags: cucumber-js -p default --tags @replacetag --format json:reports/cucumber-report.json --format summary && ts-node report-generator.ts
scripts.test:valid: cucumber-js -p default --tags @valid --format json:reports/cucumber-report.json --format summary && ts-node report-generator.ts
scripts.test:invalid: cucumber-js -p default --tags @invalid --format json:reports/cucumber-report.json --format summary && ts-node report-generator.ts
scripts.test:locked: cucumber-js -p default --tags @locked --format json:reports/cucumber-report.json --format summary && ts-node report-generator.ts
scripts.test:all: cucumber-js -p default --format json:reports/cucumber-report.json --format summary && ts-node report-generator.ts
